newsitem.title: JAPAN: Minolta up on earnings forecast. [CORRECTED 01:35 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Minolta up on earnings forecast. [CORRECTED 01:35 GMT]

text.p: (Corrects headline and text to show the company issued only forecasts, not actual earnings)

Shares in Minolta Co Ltd rose in Wednesday morning trade as investors welcomed the company's solid earnings forecasts announced on Tuesday, brokers said. As of 0051 GMT, the shares were up 13 yen at 704 yen, ranking 13th on the Tokyo Stock Exchange first section by volume.
The camera and plain paper copier maker said on Tuesday that its parent current profit would be 7.00 billion yen for the year to next March 31, up from a previous forcast of 5.00 billion.
Minolta forecast earnings of 3.50 billion yen for the half-year to September 30, compared with 1.50 billion a year ago.
